title: Get GAMING PLATFORM Node by ID
user_story:
As an API consumer
I want to be able to request a specific GAMING PLATFORM
So I can find out all the details about it when I only have its ID
description:
* The requested GAMING PLATFORM node is returned when the provided ID is valid. -> Status Code \`200\`
* A successful request returns the node with all specified properties.
* Properties are returned, even when they are empty (optional fields). They are returned with value \`null\`.
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This case can happen when there exists no node with that ID or when the node is not from type GAMING PLATFORM. -> Status Code \`404\`
